content: this legal case involves a situation where multiple people coown a property the court has decided that the coownership should be dissolved and the property should be sold at a public auction the proceeds from the sale will be divided among the coowners based on their ownership ratios the petitioner a company called m ltd requested the termination of the coownership because it no longer works for everyone involved the court inspected the property and determined that it cannot be divided into separate parts the petitioner did not agree to establish condominium ownership therefore the court decided to proceed with the termination of the coownership through civil division as stated in the law
